BR.name: My Life on a Farm 3D
BR.description: A vida na fazenda é muito divertida, sempre há algo emocionante para fazer: Cuide dos animais, cultive os campos com o trator ou venda produtos caseiros na loja da fazenda. Cuida de vacas, ovelhas, jumentos, porcos de trufas, peixes, abelhas, galinhas, patos e gansos Divirta-se com atividades reais da fazenda em divertidos minijogos: cultive os campos, colha legumes, verduras e frutas, colete madeira, ovos, trufas e mel, ordenhe as vacas, tosquie as ovelhas e muito mais Gerencie a loja da sua fazenda: Aprenda mais de 100 receitas e produza torta de maçã, pão, queijo e outros produtos para vender Incline o seu Nintendo 3DS™ e use os incríveis controles do giroscópio para dirigir o trator Suporta os controles botão deslizante do seu Nintendo 3DS. Recurso de foto em 3D: tire uma foto em 3D verdadeira de si mesmo e use-a no jogo. Colete Moedas de Jogo e troque-as por moeda do jogo.

CA.name: My Life on a Farm 3D
CA.description: Life on a farm is a lot of fun, as there always is something exciting to do: Care for your animals, cultivate your fields with the tractor or sell self-made products in your own farmshop. Care for cows, sheep, donkeys, truffle pigs, fish, bees, chickens, ducks and geese Enjoy loads of real farm activities in funny minigames: cultivate fields, harvest vegetables and fruit, collect wood, eggs, truffles and honey, milk the cows, shear the sheep and much more Manage your own farm shop: Learn over 100 recipes and produce apple pie, bread, cheese and more for selling Drive the tractor by tilting your Nintendo 3DS™ using the amazing gyroscope controls Supports Circle Pad controls of your Nintendo 3DS 3D photo feature: Take a real 3D photo of yourself and use it in the game Collect Play Coins and exchange them for in-game currency

MX.name: My Life on a Farm 3D
MX.description: La vida en la granja es muy divertida, ya que siempre hay tareas emocionantes que realizar: Cuida de tus animales, cultiva tus campos con el tractor o vende los productos de elaboración propia en la tienda de tu granja. Cuida de vacas, ovejas, burros, cerdos, peces, abejas, gallinas, patos y ocas Disfruta al máximo de las actividades reales de la granja a través de divertidos minijuegos: cultivar los campos, cosechar verduras y frutas, recoger madera, huevos, trufas y miel, ordeñar las vacas y esquilar las ovejas, entre otras muchas actividades Gestiona tu propia tienda en la granja: Aprende más de 100 recetas y produce tartas de manzana, pan, queso y otros alimentos para su venta Conduce el tractor inclinando tu Nintendo 3DS™ gracias al increíble sensor giroscópico Compatible con controles de mando circular de tu Nintendo 3DS™. Función de fotos en 3D: hazte una foto en 3D y utilízala en el juego. Consigue monedas de juego y cámbialas por monedas en el juego.

US.name: My Life on a Farm 3D
US.description: Life on a farm is a lot of fun, as there always is something exciting to do: Care for your animals, cultivate your fields with the tractor or sell self-made products in your own farmshop. Care for cows, sheep, donkeys, truffle pigs, fish, bees, chickens, ducks and geese Enjoy loads of real farm activities in funny minigames: cultivate fields, harvest vegetables and fruit, collect wood, eggs, truffles and honey, milk the cows, shear the sheep and much more Manage your own farm shop: Learn over 100 recipes and produce apple pie, bread, cheese and more for selling Drive the tractor by tilting your Nintendo 3DS™ using the amazing gyroscope controls Supports Circle Pad controls of your Nintendo 3DS 3D photo feature: Take a real 3D photo of yourself and use it in the game Collect Play Coins and exchange them for in-game currency
